transcripts.text: forgot to book somebody for this friday's episode of truth wanted.  now what am i gonna do?
uh yeah sure okay but like who are you?
it's me jesus.  i noticed we haven't been as close as we used to be.  i think we need to talk.
actually it's funny.  you mentioned that.  um would you happen to be available this friday from 7 to 8 30 p.m central.
Let me check my calendar.  Hmm.  Monday's booked.  Taco Tuesdays.  Working on Water Wednesday.
Thanks, Jesus.  I'm looking forward to it.

Me too.  Well, sorry, I gotta run.  This pandemic thing has gotten a little out of control and is keeping Dad and I overly busy with thoughts and prayers and stuff.  Peace be with you and all that.  Laters.

Well, you heard it here, folks.  Looks like Jesus is going to be my special guest live at 7pm Central this Friday on my YouTube channel, Truth Wanted.  You know, I always wanted the truth when I first started this thing.  Maybe Jesus will give it to me.  We'll find out.
